text.label: Plugin Info
text.text: Special effects to make dialog stand out.

field.hint: maximum x range from base position when vibrating.
field.label: Max Shake Offset X
field.name: v_maxShakeOffsetX

field.hint: maximum y range from base position when vibrating.
field.label: Max Shake Offset Y
field.name: v_maxShakeOffsetY

field.hint: milliseconds before the character moves again. (100, vibrates 10 times / second)
field.label: Shake Frequency
field.name: v_shakeFrequency

field.hint: maximum distance from base y position (5, ranges from base_y - 5 ~ base_y + 5)
field.label: Sine Magnitude
field.name: s_magnitude

field.hint: milliseconds it takes to complete a cycle. (1000, takes 1 second to go up, then down, then back to start)
field.label: Sine Frequency
field.name: s_frequency

field.hint: milliseconds different from previous character. (100, if previous typed character is at 120 ms / 1000, then this character will start at 220 ms / 1000)
field.label: Sine Pattern
field.name: s_pattern

field.hint: diameter of the circle that the revolution of this character will form. (4, this character will have a max range of 2 pixels up/down/left/right from its base position)
field.label: Revolve Diameter
field.name: r_diameter

field.hint: milliseconds it takes to complete a cycle. (1000, takes 1 second to go around in a circle and return to starting position)
field.label: Revolve Frequency
field.name: r_frequency

field.hint: milliseconds different from previous character. (100, if previous typed character is at 120 ms / 1000, then this character will start at 220 ms / 1000)
field.label: Revolve Pattern
field.name: r_pattern

field.hint: scale that the character starts at. (5, character begins at 5x its normal size)
field.label: Grow Start
field.name: g_start

field.hint: scale that the character stops at. (1, character returns to its normal size)
field.label: Grow Stop
field.name: g_stop

field.hint: milliseconds it takes the character to grow from start size to stop size.
field.label: Grow Duration
field.name: g_duration
